## Origin



- Clavicular part: [Clavicle (medial half)]({{< var ref-clavicle-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- Sternocostal part: [sternum]({{< var ref-sternum-bone.path >}}), [costal cartilages 1â€“6]({{< var ref-costal-cartilages.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- Abdominal part: [rectus sheath (anterior layer)]({{< var ref-rectus-sheath.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020


## Insertion
[Humerus (crest of greater tubercle)]({{< var ref-humerus-bone.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation

[Lateral pectoral nerve]({{< var ref-lateral-pectoral-nerve.path >}}) and [Medial pectoral nerve]({{< var ref-medial-pectoral-nerve.path >}}) (C5-T1) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

Entire muscle: adduction, internal rotation 
Clavicular and sternocostal parts: flexion; assist in respiration when shoulder is fixed
